name: Bored Slime
description:
Today was a Boring day, Why not fight some Bosses to kill time?

.

Move with WASD

Shoot with Left Mouse (you can hold the button to Auto-Shoot)

Right Mouse / Space to Dash

.

This game was made for Brackeys Game Jam  2021.1

.

Game By :

Ven

Music By :

Noha

.

Font Used:

https://www.dafont.com/royal-king.font

.

Thanks for playing
